website_summaries.verdict: Budding artists are sure to have a blast decorating this adorable 12-inch plush unicorn over and over again. A huggable texture combined with coloring fun offers 2 classic kid favorites.
pros: Washable design keeps little hands busy with coloring and encourages free creative expression
Markers last reasonably long and are easy to replace
Washes clean and holds up beautifully wash after wash
cons: A couple of extra colors would be a useful addition
Darker colors can be a bit stubborn if left unwashed for days at a time

customer_reviews.title: My nieces love it
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my nieces and they loveee it! They paint it then wash it and paint it again! All the time and its been like 4 months since I bought it and it still works perfectoy and they still love it
customer_reviews.author: S. Hen

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and good quality! Purchased as a gift for a 9 year old and she is going to love it!
customer_reviews.author: RJ1

customer_reviews.title: adorable
customer_reviews.text: Was given as a gift to my niece who ripped it open and started decorating it immediately after opening it. She was made it only gave her a few colors but she got over it. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: jdls

customer_reviews.title: Easiest, foolproof gift for a kid!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute gift! Bought this as a gift for my friends daughter and she loved it! Kids that love drawing on walls will love this lol. Very good size and looks like this is the modern doodle bear. Would recommend to anyone needing a gift for a 5 year old!
customer_reviews.author: dani

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kiddos that draw on everything!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yo loves this unicorn and the fact she can draw all over it and then wash it is amazing to her. This would be a super cute gift. Most washable markers work well on it.
customer_reviews.author: CLEphotog82

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd Color N’ Wash because the first one is used all the time! My girls love these! We have washed them multiple times and the marker comes off completely.
customer_reviews.author: Ewild

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this originally for a gift but ended up returning it only because my daughter asked for some other gifts that she wanted more. When this arrived though it was super cute! I should have kept it and saved it for a birthday! Can't speak to durability since we returned it but it looked well made and is exactly as pictured. It's the perfect size for toddlers and seems to be a really fun toy.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie E

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it and it's machine washable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friend's kids' birthday and my son loved it so much I had to give it to him and bought another for my friend's kid. Love this. I love that you can wash it. Just knowing it's washing machine safe lets me be worry free of germs. But also washes away for a clean new coloring surface! Also, it was my friend's kid's favorite present he received for his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hedrick

customer_reviews.title: Best gift for tha aspiring wee artist.
customer_reviews.text: The perfect gift for your little artist. Absolutely adorable. And fun for the toddler to the grown child too. MADE QUARTENNIE EASIER
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Meeks

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really enjoyed the toy. She’s been proud of her creations on the toy and loved being able to wash and start over again. It looked great after washing and looked like new. The only negative is the body fabric isn’t soft so she doesn’t really like to cuddle with it.
customer_reviews.author: JB22

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old for Christmas and she loves it! We've only washed it once so far, but it came out perfectly clean on the first wash. Only challenge is keeping track of the markers, there isn't anywhere to store them.
customer_reviews.author: The Pastor's Wife

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and durable washes well
customer_reviews.text: Very cute idea washes up really well daughter had a lot of fun with it and will continue to enjoy it with every wash
customer_reviews.author: JMMM

customer_reviews.title: A perfect gift

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!

product_meta.title: Crayola Deluxe Color 'N Plush - Unicorn
product_meta.description: Style:UnicornCreate a one-of-a-kind masterpiece with the Deluxe Color ‘N Plush Unicorn! Kids can color, wash and color again for endless creativity! This adorable Unicorn comes with four ultra-clean washable markers for coloring fun and washability you can trust. Creativity and fun never ends with the Deluxe Color ‘N Plush Unicorn! For kids ages 3+.
feature_bullets: Create a one-of-a-kind masterpiece with the Crayola Deluxe Color ‘N Plush Unicorn.
Kids can Doodle color, wash and color again for endless creativity!
This adorable Unicorn comes with four ultra-clean washable markers for coloring fun and wash ability you can trust.
Creativity and fun never ends with the Deluxe Color ‘N Plush Unicorn!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars673 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
